mcq.statement: Which sentence uses inverted commas correctly? She said, "We are going to the park"., She said, "We are going to the park.", She said "We are going to the park"., None of these

options.a: She said, "We are going to the park".
options.b: She said, "We are going to the park."
options.c: She said "We are going to the park".
